ability: 【A】When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, if you have 4 or more other 《音楽》 Characters, you may place the top card of your Deck into Stock.

name: 着替え中の翼
flavor_text: 私は、その……こういうところに気がまわらなくて……
ability: 【A】 When this card attacks, if 「あの頃は二人だった」 is in the Climax Slot, if you have 4 or more other Characters with 「翼」 in its name, you may draw 1 card.

name: 決死の攻防戦 翼
flavor_text: 命は尽きて終わりじゃない！
ability: 【A】You can only activate this ability up to 2 times per turn. During your turn, when you played an Event, until the end of your opponent's next turn, this card gets +1000 Power.

name: 凛とした佇まい 翼
flavor_text: 風鳴翼が唄うのは戦場ばかりでないと知れ！
ability: 【C】When you are paying the cost for an Event played from Hand, you may place a Marker from under this card into Waiting Room instead for each Stock.
【C】SUPPORT All your Characters in front of this card gets +X Power. X is equals to that Character's Level ×500.
【A】［REST this card］When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, place the top card of your Deck under this card as a Marker.

name: 唄うことの喜び 翼
flavor_text: 世界中の人達に、私の歌を聴いてもらいたい！
ability: 【A】When this card attacks, if 「FLIGHT FEATHERS」 is in the Climax Slot, until the end of your opponent's next turn, this card gets +3000 Power.

name: 風鳴 翼
flavor_text: 勝機を零すな！掴み取れ！
ability: 【C】 RECOLLECTION If your Memory has 「天羽々斬」, this card gets +1500 Power.
【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card from your Hand, place it into Waiting Room.

name: 仲間への信頼 翼
flavor_text: 立花には驚かされっぱなしだ
ability: 【C】 SUPPORT All your Characters in front of this card gets +500 Power.
【S】 ［REST 2 of your Characters］Choose 1 of your 《音楽》 Characters, during this turn, it gets +1 Level, +500 Power.

name: 剣としての覚悟 翼
flavor_text: 今日に折れて死んでも……明日に人として唄うために……
ability: 【A】［①］When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose 1 「天羽々斬」 in your Waiting Room, return it to Hand.
【A】◆ SHIFT Level 0 (At the beginning of your Main Phase, you may choose 1 Blue card from your Hand and this card in your Clock, exchange them.)

name: はじめてのデート 翼
flavor_text:
隣にいる立花がこの形相では、
まるで心が弾まないな
ability: 【C】 If you have 1 or less other Character, this card gets +1000 Power, and gains the following ability. 『【C】 This card cannot be REVERSE by your opponent's Character's 【A】 effects.』

name: あの日の翼
flavor_text:
そして、シンフォギアをまとった私達は
ノイズを討つ戦士となった
ability: 【C】During your opponent's turn, for each of your other 「シンフォギアの装者 奏」, this card gets +2000 Power.

name: 防人の生き様 翼
flavor_text: 戦場で、何をバカなことを！
ability: 【A】 When this card attacks, if 「蒼ノ一閃」 is in the Climax Slot, until the end of your opponent's next turn, this card gets +1500 Power.
【A】 ENCORE ［Place 1 Character from Hand into Waiting Room］ (When this card is placed into Waiting Room from Stage, you may pay this cost. If you do, place this card in its previous slot in REST)

name: 不協和音 翼
flavor_text: あなたが奏の何を受け継いでいるというの！
ability: 【A】 BOND／「シンフォギアの装者 奏」［Place the top card of your Deck into Clock］(When this card is played on Stage, you may pay this cost. If you do, choose 1 「シンフォギアの装者 奏」 from your Waiting Room, return to Hand)

name: 冷徹な態度 翼
flavor_text: 重要参考人として、再度本部まで同行してもらいます

name: 入院中の翼

ability: 【C】During your opponent's turn, this card gets +1000 Power.

name: ノイズに立ち向かう翼

ability: 【S】● ASSIST 2000 Level 1［① Place this card from Hand into Waiting Room］(Choose 1 of your Characters being Front Attacked, during this turn, it gets +2000 Power.)

期待はしているが、
たかが遊戯に少しつぎ込みすぎではないか？
ability: 【C】During your opponent's turn, for each of your 《音楽》 Characters, this card gets +500 Power.

奏「あたしとあんた、両翼揃ったツヴァイウィングは、

Gatrandis babel zigguratedena

Choose the top card from your Clock, place it into Waiting Room. Place this card into Memory.
